Name: mason_campus_2005_walk_ways
LayerDisplayName: Walkways of George Mason University, Fairfax Campus, VA 2005
Originator: Government Documents and Maps, GMU Libraries
OriginatorSort: Government Documents and Maps, GMU Libraries
Abstract: This polyline layer represents sidewalk ways on GMU Fairfax campus, VA based on the observation in 2005.

    <descript>
      <abstract>This polyline layer represents sidewalk ways on GMU Fairfax campus, VA based on the observation in 2005.</abstract>
      <purpose>The dataset was intended to use for GIS analysis and mapping purposes.  It may be used for tracing historical changes of the campus layout. </purpose>
    </descript>
